Articles.Content:
Helooww Everyone , i am newbie play KSP 0.25 , nice to meet you people .

hey i have some problem with antenna , the problem is .

i need more antenna than comm 66-66 or the other ,

i have already download origami folderable antenna but game is crash in loading screen . .

long ago before my crush text me (forget it) ehem , i have interesting antenna mods , and i like it , here some picure i download from google

And There is my favorit antenna mods small one in rover ass

You See that OPEN AND CLOSE , like cargo . And i need antenna mods for my mission to duna , yeah , i like that name .

i already install

-remote tech

-scansat

I hope anyone can help me ,

nb: i have bad english . if i do wrong please tell me , but i like holywood movie
Most of that looks like RemoteTech antennas. Forum link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83305

First pic looks like RemoteTech 1 and 2nd looks like a dish in Tantares http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81537-0-90-Tantares-Stockalike-Soyuz-and-MIR-13-2-Crew-1-25m-Pod-Fuji-Release! 3nd is a mix of RemoteTech 1 and RemoteTech 2 and Aies / RT2 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83305 Aies http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35383-0-21-1-AIES-Aerospace-v1-4-2 and if you want RemoteTech 1 one pm me.

EDIT- If you like prebuilt Sat look at US Probes Pack http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93389-0-90-US-Probes-Pack-Old-and-New-v0-29-5-1-Release-12-27-14

Soviet Probes http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88045 and theres Lionhead Aerospace http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12106-0-25-Lionhead-Aerospace-Inc-Icarus-v0-4-updated

Edited December 28, 2014 by Mecripp2

The last pic definately has two foldable antennas from the old version of RemoteTech 1, they were removed when they changed to RemoteTech 2 (which was then renamed back to remoteTech 1). I have an old copy of RemoteTech 1 but unfortunately the antellas are no longer compatible with KSP as the deployment animations and tracking don't work.

It sucks, they were the best antennas because they could track planets and crafts, like how solar panels track the sun. I have no idea why they would update RemoteTech and not include them.

if you want RemoteTech 1 one pm me.

If you have a copy of them that works with the latest version of KSP, i am very very interested

Did have them working in .24 and the little RT 1 sat and little plane it had but haven't tryed them in .90

EDIT- I'll make sure and let you know if you want.

Edited December 29, 2014 by Mecripp2

Did have them working in .24 and the little RT 1 sat and little plane it had but haven't tryed them in .90

EDIT- I'll make sure and let you know if you want.

damn i forgot about the little sat and the probe! they were super awesome too.

i tried the dishes in 0.25 and they didn't work. The textures were ok, but i'm not sure if there was another mod dependency that i needed for the animations to work. The original RemoteTech 1 thread was deleted so i couldn't confirm.

i used the most recent version of RemoteTech 1 before they switched to RemoteTech 2.

yeah if you can get it to work, definately PM me. Better still, upload it so others can enjoy it (not sure about the licensing though - once again, the original thread and it's licensing requirements have been deleted).

yeah if you can get it to work, definately PM me. Better still, upload it so others can enjoy it (not sure about the licensing though - once again, the original thread and it's licensing requirements have been deleted).

Fighting with the little sat most work but the little antenna on it doesn't want to extend and one of the deploys will to transmit but thats it fight with now and the AeroProbe got it all working but one of the wings looks upside down but flys.

EDIT- Now they don't track that was in the old plugin it did work but had errors spamming the log in .25 .
